Black and White Colobus Monkey 
Colobus Guereza
Endangered
Forests, woodlands or wooded grasslands
Africa 
Native to more than African countries
Colobus monkeys are Old World monkeys of the genus Colobus, native to Africa. They are closely related to the red colobus monkeys of genus Piliocolobus. There are five species of this monkey, and at least eight subspecies. They are generally found in high-density forests where they forage on leaves, flowers and fruit
